messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Morgue Maintenance.

messages.author: Bridge
messages.body: If you guysss dont ssset the fucking sssuit sssensssorsss to max i iwll not give a fuck if you die

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

All SMESs on Deep Doctor's Village 93 have been recharged. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Deep Doctor's Village 93. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on the communications traffic on your station, we believe that all of the station's [REDACTED] has developed lizard level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Testing Lab.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Deep Doctor's Village 93 door subroutines. Severity level of 1. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Deep Doctor's Village 93. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Head of Personnel's Office.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Engineering SMES.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to climate change, a horde of [REDACTED] have descended into the place with all those juicy wires.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Who ever recall again is getting left behind

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Im going to kill my self have a good day
